thread.title_full: Game of Thrones actor Neil Fingleton, who played giant ‘Mag the Mighty', dies aged 36 - 9news.com.au

title: Game of Thrones actor Neil Fingleton, who played giant ‘Mag the Mighty', dies aged 36 - 9news.com.au
text:
Game of Thrones actor Neil Fingleton, who played giant ‘Mag the Mighty', dies aged 36 By Actor Neil Fingleton has died aged 36. (AAP) 
Game of Thrones actor Neil Fingleton has reportedly died aged 36. 
The 7ft 7in star played the giant known as 'Mag the Might' in the acclaimed TV series. 
It is understood he died of heart failure on Saturday. 
Fingleton was thought to be Britain’s tallest man, and played basketball in the US before becoming an actor. 
He also appeared in X-Men Fire Class, Doctor Who and 47 Ronin. 
“Sadly it can come to our attention that Neil Fingleton Britain’s Tallet man passed away on Saturday,” a statement from the Tall Persons Club said. Neil Fingleton was Britain's tallest man and measured 7ft 7 inches. (AAP) 
“Neil became Britain's Tallest man in 2007 passing the height of Chris Greener. 
“Neil started off in basketball in the USA before becoming a actor and starring in the X-men first class and also recently in the Game of Thrones.“Our thoughts and condolences go out to his family.”
